projects.title: BizManager – Pharmaceutical ERP & GST Management System
projects.description: A specialized ERP platform for pharmaceutical retailers that automates inventory management, GST-compliant billing, financial reporting, and audit tracking.
keyFeatures: GST-compliant billing system with CGST/SGST breakdown
Automated tax liability computation (Output - Input Tax Credit)
Inventory management with batch tracking and low-stock alerts
Procurement and supplier purchase recording
Real-time Profit & Loss analytics dashboard
Multi-tenant data isolation using Firestore security rules
Comprehensive audit logging for all transactions

projects.title: MediCloud – AI-Powered E-Healthcare Platform
projects.description: A cloud-native healthcare marketplace enabling users to order medicines, book lab tests, and schedule doctor appointments with AI-powered prescription scanning.
keyFeatures: AI-powered prescription scanner using Gemini to extract medicines from uploaded images
AI symptom checker for preliminary health suggestions
Secure user authentication and multi-step checkout system
Admin dashboard with order, product, and inventory management
Bulk product upload via CSV/Excel
Real-time order tracking and stock control

projects.title: TherAssist – AI-Powered Therapy Session Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent assistant designed to support therapists during patient sessions by maintaining contextual memory, transcribing handwritten notes, and providing real-time AI-driven suggestions.
keyFeatures: Persistent patient memory system for contextual AI responses
Real-time AI-generated conversation suggestions
Handwritten note scanning and AI transcription
Editable patient memory storage
Responsive, mobile-optimized interface
Session-based conversation management

projects.title: react-zayed – Full Stack App Generator (NPM CLI)
projects.description: A custom NPM CLI tool that scaffolds a production-ready full-stack application using React, Vite, Express, SQLite, and Drizzle ORM.
keyFeatures: Custom CLI tool executable via npx
Scaffolds full-stack frontend and backend structure
Pre-configured Express API with SQLite database
Integrated React Router and Context API setup
One-command full-stack development workflow
GitHub Actions setup for package testing

projects.title: Banking Desktop App
projects.description: A desktop banking application built with Python's Tkinter library, allowing users to perform basic banking operations.
keyFeatures: User account creation and login
View account balance
Deposit and withdraw funds
View transaction history

projects.title: Basic Sales Dashboard
projects.description: A sales dashboard created to visualize key performance indicators and sales data.
keyFeatures: Interactive charts and graphs
Sales trend analysis
Product performance metrics
Regional sales data
